text:
LE TOTE - San Francisco, CA. We're changing the way women view their closets by renting out unlimited garments and accessories for one monthly rate. We grew 450% yoy last year and are on target to do 2x this year! Come grow with us!

We're looking for:

  - Ruby Software Engineers
  - Sr. Product Manager
  - Data Scientist
  - Growth Engineer
  - Lead Front-end Engineer
  - Lead Ruby Engineer
Our Stack: Ruby/Rails/Sass/CoffeeScript/MySQL/Redis/RSpec/AWS Interested? cindy a/t letote d/o/t com. Passionate team, medical, dental & vision, equity in a growing company, flex vacation policy, fully stocked kitchen, snacks, dogs, yoga, choose your own gear, etc. ----
